item.title: Museum Groups
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If you are not on the list or you’re listed in the wrong place, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Group assignments Canadian Museum of History, Fort Frontenac excavation records Maggie Micah Marvin Museum of Nature, archaeofaunal records Chloe Malinda Aaliyah Arianna Alina Canadian Science and Technology Museum, surveying markers collection Jess Elise Riley Emilee
